sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with re fei 熱痱 , heat with seething rash. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 1: 炎暑流火，民病 寒熱、瘡瘍、痱疹、癰痤，法宜調以辛温 , “In the case of summerheat causing flowing fire [i.e. erysipelas], when people suffer from alternating sensations of cold and heat, ulcers, seething-rash papules , obstruction-illnesses and acne, this is to be corrected by means of acrid and warming [substances]”.
